Articles.Content:
I don't know if this is the right place to post this, or if the Firespitter mod is actually at fault, but I found this bug to be pretty amusing.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wdpBVMTL-BE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Just goes to prove I wait a bit before using MODS !

I am in Career mode and this wouldnt bode too well altho I always simulate tests before doing real missions; try without the prop; try using no tanks and the prop...narrow down the problem maybe...too funny !

Cmdr Zeta
